attributes.action: Prosecute all social workers and Cafcass who deliberately miss lead Family Court
attributes.background:
Too many children are being removed from loving families due to false allegations by SOCIAL Workers and Cafcass in uninvestgated  reports used in FAMILY COURT. 
Finding of facts refused historical data refused to be looked at by judges

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because decisions to prosecute someone are taken by the Criminal Prosecution Service, which is independent of the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find advice on how to complain about social services here:

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/wales/family/looking-after-people/social-services-complaints-w/
